name.baseName: Shale gas development ;Shale formation; Hydraulic fracturing
页岩气开发 ;页岩地层; 水力压裂

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: With shale gas production booming in the United States and gas prices falling in the United States, interest in shale gas is growing in many countries with shale reserves, and some European Union countries, including Britain, are already exploring. Any commercial development of shale gas in Europe requires extensive environmental assessments, recognizing Europe's different conditions and legislation
随着美国页岩气产量的繁荣和美国天然气价格的下跌，许多拥有页岩储量的国家对页岩气的兴趣正在增加，包括英国在内的一些欧盟国家已经在进行勘探。欧洲页岩气的任何商业开发都需要广泛的环境评估，认识到欧洲不同的条件和立法

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: This study focuses on the situation in Britain and uses life cycle assessment (LCA) to estimate the impact of shale gas on the environment; The burden of shale gas production in the UK is compared with the burden of natural gas mixing in the UK at present. The main focus is on the analysis of water impacts, but a wide range of other impact categories are also considered.
本研究重点关注英国的情况，并使用生命周期评估（LCA）估计页岩气对环境的影响;将英国页岩气生产的负担与当前英国天然气混合的负担进行了比较。主要重点是对水影响的分析，但也考虑了广泛的其他影响类别。
technology.technologicalApplicability: Shale gas development via hydraulic fracturing in shale formations is intended for the production of natural gas, primarily used as an energy source for heating, electricity generation, and as feedstock in the chemical industry. This industrial process involves the extraction of gas trapped within shale formations, bringing it to the surface for processing and distribution.
通过页岩地层的水力压裂进行的页岩气开发，主要用于生产用于加热、发电以及作为化学工业原料的天然气。该工业过程涉及提取困在页岩地层中的天然气，将其带到地面进行处理和分配。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: LCA model is based on the analysis of more than 60 open source literature data. The robustness of the model is tested by sensitivity analysis of key parameters. The system boundary does not include the use of natural gas, because natural gas is the same whether shale gas or conventional natural gas is used.
LCA 模型基于对 60 多个公开来源的文献数据的分析。通过对关键参数的敏感性分析来检验模型的鲁棒性。系统边界不包括天然气的使用，因为无论使用页岩气还是常规天然气，天然气都是相同的。
dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataTreatmentAndExtrapolationsPrinciples: According to ISO 14046 standard (ISO 14046 2014), the impacts related to fresh water use, degradation and consumption were analyzed respectively.
根据ISO 14046标准（ISO 14046 2014）分别分析了与淡水使用、降解和消耗有关的影响。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Tagliaferri, C., Clift, R., Lettieri, P. & Chapman, C. Shale gas: a life-cycle perspective for UK production. Int J Life Cycle Assess 22, 919–937 (2017).
Tagliaferri, C., Clift, R., Lettieri, P. & Chapman, C. Shale gas: a life-cycle perspective for UK production. Int J Life Cycle Assess 22, 919–937 (2017).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When using LCA data from this study focused on British shale gas production, users must note that the environmental impact assessment is based on a comparison with the current natural gas mixture in the UK. It is important to consider the technological applicability that this data specifically excludes the use phase of natural gas. Data users should conduct their assessments in alignment with the ISO 14046 standard, ensuring to take into account fresh water use, degradation, and consumption associated with this industrial process.
在使用本研究中关注的英国页岩气生产的生命周期评估（LCA）数据时，用户必须注意，环境影响评估是基于与当前英国天然气混合物的比较进行的。重要的是要考虑这些数据具体排除了天然气使用阶段的技术适用性。数据用户在进行评估时应与ISO 14046标准保持一致，确保考虑到与这个工业过程相关的淡水使用、降解和消耗。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。
